mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartNum,itemNum,customerEmail,itemQty,itemSize,itemColor) values (#{cartNum},#{itemNum},#{customerEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{itemQty}, #{itemSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{itemColor, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cart set itemQty=itemQty+#{itemQty} where customerEmail = #{customerEmail} and itemNum=#{itemNum} and itemSize=#{itemSize} and itemColor=#{itemColor}
mapper.select: select a.cartNum, a.itemNum, a.customerEmail, a.itemQty,a.itemSize,a.itemColor, b.itemName, b.itemPrice, b.itemDiscount,b.itemStock, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = b.itemImage1 ) as itemImage1 from cart a join item b on a.itemNum = b.itemNum where customerEmail = #{customerEmail}
